A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was an excellent addition to the Starwars franchise. At times it felt as though there was just far to much going on and I would have changed many things.  The pacing was good\,  it was always entertaining and fun\, never predictable\,  and in the end it was a true Star Wars film.  For those reasons I say it was a great film and I will enjoy it again and again.  Yes\,  Luke made stupid decisions\,  Leia deserved a decent send off\, and I would have liked to have had a more well defined family history for Rey.  However\, If it would have been what I predicted\,  I wouldn't be so frustrated or entertained after my first viewing. I have so many questions\, so many things i loved\, so many things i hated. Can't wait to see what JJ Abrams brings to the next film and the future of Star wars.
